FlowRecordRelation.name: FlowRecordRelation
FlowRecordRelation.description: Represents a relationship between a record and a flow interview. When a flow interview is paused, Salesforce uses the $Flow.CurrentRecord global variable in the flow to associate the interview with a record.

Name.description: The auto-generated ID of this relation.

ParentId.description: The flow interview that the record is related to.

RelatedRecordId.description: The record that the flow interview is related to. Make sure that this field contains only one ID, and that the ID is for a valid object. Custom objects and most standard objects are supported.
